meanings.definition: Carry out or fulfill (an action, task, or function)
meanings.sent1: She performed her daily chores with a smile.
meanings.sent2: The singer performed a beautiful song on stage.
meanings.sent3: The cat performed a dance routine for treats.
meanings.sent4: The engine performed like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The magician performed a disappearing act that amazed the audience.

meanings.definition: Present (a play, concert, or other form of entertainment) to an audience
meanings.sent1: The actors performed a comedy for the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The band performed their new album live.
meanings.sent3: The penguin performed a stand-up comedy routine.
meanings.sent4: The fireworks display performed a symphony of light in the sky.
meanings.sent5: The circus performers performed daring stunts under the big top.

meanings.definition: Achieve or execute a task or action
meanings.sent1: He performed exceptionally well in the exam.
meanings.sent2: The athlete performed a new record in the race.
meanings.sent3: The robot performed a flawless cleaning of the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun performed its daily journey across the sky.
meanings.sent5: The chef performed culinary magic in the kitchen.
